jd: From: Anju Pathak, Tek Inspirations LLC anju.pathak@tekinspirations.com Reply to: anju.pathak@tekinspirations.com PLEASE SHARE YOUR RESUME WHO ARE LOCAL TO PHOENIX, ARIZONA AND WILLING TO GO ONSITE INTERVIEW PLEASE DONT WASTE MY TIME AS A REQUEST.Interview – video + OnsiteJob Description -100% InterviewBusiness System AnalystHybrid - Scottsdale, AZNeed LINKEDINDescription:Must haves: Phoenix Area Resident currentlyWilling to go onsite 3X per weekBusiness AnalystAPIData Mapping Looking for Data Mapping & API experience. Gains a thorough understanding of customer requests via analysis and interviews with Product Owners and subject matter experts to fully manage user stories from inception through acceptance.STRONG Mapping history in creating mapping documents from scratch when Mapping between 4 different systems.Will gather all the technical information needed for hand-off to Production Operations and Resilience.Works independently on larger, moderately complex assignments that directly impact the department.Solid understanding of systems development and input/output modeling.STRONG Understanding of message processing UIs such as (SoapUI, ReadyAPI) for functional API testingAbility to interact with the Operating System, locating and reading files.Understand and articulate story/functionality/project dependencies on both system and dependent teams.
